titleStmt.title: The loyal remembrancer: or, A poem dedicated to the queens most Excellent Majesty, and may serve as a remembrance to all posterity.
titleStmt.author: Crown, S.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R. Wood, 1650. But not permitted to be publick till now,

notesStmt.note: Dediction signed: S. C., i.e. S. Crown.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
